captions.text: # l don't care about the presents #
# l just wantyou for my own #
# More than you could ever know #
# l don't want a lot for Christmas #

# l don't care
about the presents #
# l just wantyou for my own #
#All l want for Christmas is you #

#All the lights are shining
so brightly eve_here #

#And the sound of
children's laughter fills the air#

# l hear those
sleigh bells ringin' #

# Santa, won'tyou bring me
my honey#

#Won'tyou please bring
my baby to me #

# l don't want
a lot forChristmas#

-#This is all l'm asking for#
- #All l'm asking for#

# t just wanna see
my baby#
# l just wantyou for my own #

- # More than you could ever know #
- #You will ever know #

So, not quite as secret
as we'd hoped.

comments.text:
All I can imagine is Marceline the vampire queen meeting Ferb. 

Marceline wakes up in a new world 
Marceline: Where am I?
(Sees Ferb working on a flying car )
Marceline: Hey you! Where am I? 
Ferb:....
Marceline: Come on dude you can talk to me, what's your name?
Ferb: Ferb 
Marceline: Ok Ferb sweet digs, know where I can crash the night? 
Ferb:....
Marceline: It's cool I can see your busy, nice meeting you, Ferb.
She floats away 
Ferb whispers: (Come back)😔
﻿

*Love Actually* (2003)

Another Christmas movie that I need to get out and watch again...
This young lady has a wonderful voice,
singing *All I Want for Christmas is You*... 
*Olivia Rose Olson* who is now 22 years of age...
And the young gentleman on the drums
*Thomas Brodie-Sangster* who now is 24 years of age...
*___________________________________*
#ThexChristmasSongs  ﻿

comments.text:
While mriddle72 is right about not growing up too fast, I don't see this 
movie as one to corrupt a young person. I think you'll be just fine. 
Besides the R-rated bits aren't what the movie is really about anyways.  

Just stream it on this site. Just click on proceed to video and on the next 
screen click play. It may load a little slow but its a good link. Great 
romantic/dramatic/comedy movie. http://bestreams.net/dnkn1h04bqa2
